entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
